classmethod find_conflicting_reservations(room_id, start_date, end_date)¶

Return all reservations that fits the conditions: - Reserved for room with id room_id - Start date and end date are NOT both before the target start date - Start date and end date are NOT both after the target end date

Expected query object:

check_in_date (required)- date user intends to check in check_out_date (required) - date user intends to check out room_type - type of room num_occupants - number of occupants user intends to bring
